name: .BEA File Extension
summary: Learn about .BEA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use the player-created Bezel Engine Archive Editor (Windows) to examine, extract files from, and insert file into BEA archives.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
